name: Zero Hourly Rate
description:
Created for the 2020 zero hour game jam.

Hit space to capture a screenshot*. Try to capture a meteor as it streaks across the sky.

R will reload the world (changing the sky)

Escape will quit the game.

Screenshots taken using the spacebar will be saved in Unity's persistent path.
Although that doesn't seem to be working... (0 hour game dev) so maybe just stick with the ol' print screen for now.
